item.title: ValueInjecter@3.2.0 簡單用法
item.author: Lou Chang
item.description: 基本用法 一般對應 var mapper = Mapper.Map<TargetType>(customer); or var mapper = Mapper.Map<FromType, TargetType>(customer); 客製化對應 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 Mapper.AddMap<FromType, TargetType>(src => { var res = new TargetType(); res.InjectFrom(src); // 對應相同名字及型別的屬性 res.FullName = src.FirstName + " " + src.LastName; return res; }); InjectFrom 的用法 In
